overview:
President - Smartsourcing Global Inc.

Smartsourcing Global is a full service custom software development company. We are experts in developing Web applications, SaaS solutions, eCommerce , Web 2.0 tools and online social communities using open source technologies. We also develop iPhone applications.

We have worked with brands ranging from start-ups to Fortune 500 companies. We work with our clients with varying degree of engagement - project based providing full service or build a dedicated team for ongoing development requirements or help them with specific phases of the project. We provide technology consulting services.

We can help companies with requirements as simple as building a website to developing complex custom software solutions. Our clients belong to domains like internet, retail ecommerce, logistics, supply chain management, finance and technology consulting.
